personal.name: Omar Sleam
personal.title: Technical Game Architect
personal.subtitle: Creative Developer
personal.tagline: Passionate game developer crafting immersive experiences with Unity, Unreal Engine, and cutting-edge technology. Specializing in VR, multiplayer games, and innovative gameplay mechanics.
personal.about: I'm a Technical Game Architect with over 8 years of experience building immersive gaming experiences. From VR adventures to multiplayer card games, I blend technical expertise with creative vision. I'm passionate about making games and interested in trying and learning new technologies. My experience spans across Unity, Unreal Engine, VR development, multiplayer systems, and serious games. I've worked on projects ranging from mobile card games to VR experiences and security training applications.

description: Developing serious games regarding security awareness
Working on Web, Kinect and VR games
Responsible for teaching multiple subjects as: C/C++, HTML5 game development, design patterns, Unity3D game engine, Games Optimization, version control, etc.
Responsible for rebuilding el3ab.com flash games to (web, android, iOS) Platforms using Unity3D and Phaser.js
Developing server-side of multiplayer card and board games using JAVA and Smart Fox Server

education.details: Intensive game development program covering Unity, Unreal Engine, VR development, and game design principles.

education.school: Misr Higher Institute for Engineering and Technology
education.details: Comprehensive computer engineering education with focus on software development and systems architecture.

projects.name: ComfyUI Quality of Life Suit
projects.shortDescription: Popular ComfyUI extension with 144+ GitHub stars providing quality of life improvements for AI image generation workflows.
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enhances the AI image generation workflow. Features include ChatGPT integration, prompt enhancement, and various utility nodes. This extension has gained significant traction in the AI art community with over 144 stars on GitHub.

projects.name: 3ashara Talwa
projects.shortDescription: Online multiplayer Backgammon game with strong AI, character customization, and multiple game modes.
projects.description: 3ashara Talwa is an online multiplayer game based on the rules of Backgammon popular in the Middle East. The game features two game modes 'ma7bosa' and 'therteen', strong AI opponents, character customization, and many more features.

projects.name: Estimation Kings
projects.shortDescription: Published four-player trick-taking card game available on Google Play Store.
projects.description: Are you a pro Estimation Player? If you are familiar with Tarneeb, Spades, Trix, Hearts and Balot, you will extremely enjoy playing Estimation. Estimation Kings is a four players trick-taking card game where only kings survive.

projects.name: Rhythm Attack VR
projects.shortDescription: Hyper-casual VR rhythm game - ITI graduation project with 100% original coding, art, music, and VFX.
projects.description: Rhythm Attack is a hyper-casual VR game where you defeat rhythm monsters by cutting the minions they throw at you until they get tired, then attack them with your gun to drain their health. Every time you fail to kill the enemy, he gets mad and level difficulty increases. This game was a graduation project from ITI game development diploma.

projects.name: Zinad Security Games
projects.shortDescription: Six serious games for security awareness training including Phishing Mania, Millionaire, and VR experiences.
projects.description: Zinad is a security solutions company that uses serious games to enhance employee security training. Developed 6 interactive games covering various security topics.

subProjects.title: Phishing Mania
subProjects.description: Game that teaches players how to identify phishing emails from real emails

subProjects.title: Who Will Be Millionaire
subProjects.description: Adaptation from the famous TV show focused on security field

subProjects.title: The Office VR
subProjects.description: Users eliminate clean desk policy violations before time runs out

subProjects.title: Password Ninja / URL Punk
subProjects.description: Users cut weak passwords and fake URLs to win

subProjects.title: Archery VR
subProjects.description: Users answer questions by throwing arrows at correct answers

projects.name: Optimized Unity Scroll List
projects.shortDescription: Performance-optimized scroll list for Unity with object pooling and dynamic item recycling.
projects.description: A highly optimized scroll list implementation for Unity that uses object pooling and dynamic item recycling to handle large datasets efficiently. Perfect for mobile and desktop applications.

projects.name: CityVille Game Structure
projects.shortDescription: Modular game architecture framework for city-building games in Unity.
projects.description: A comprehensive game structure and architecture framework designed for city-building games. Features modular systems for resource management, building placement, and save/load functionality.
